events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit me and I want to return it for a full refund.
The system has categorized the incoming customer issue as a Refund request based on content analysis.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in refund processes.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the jacket is too small despite ordering my usual size.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund process. Please send the jacket back within 14 days using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for your quick response. That sounds good to me, I appreciate the prepaid shipping label.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. Once we receive the returned jacket, we will issue a full refund to your original payment method.
Just checking in to confirm that you have returned the jacket and to ask if you need any further assistance.
We have received your returned jacket and completed your refund. Your case is now closed. Thank you for shopping with us!
We have sent you a short survey via email to gather feedback about your refund experience. Your input is valuable to us.
